Breakfast.details: Green Smoothie Bowl: 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup kale, 1 banana, 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup almond milk, 1 tbsp chia seeds, 1/4 cup granola, 1 tbsp almond butter
Breakfast.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth and top with granola.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Quinoa and Nut Salad: 1 cup cooked quinoa, 1/2 cup mixed greens (spinach, arugula), 1/4 cup chopped walnuts, 1/4 cup diced apple, 2 tbsp vinaigrette (olive oil, lemon juice)
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Mix quinoa, greens, walnuts, and apple. Drizzle with vinaigrette.

Lunch.details: Leafy Green and Chickpea Wrap: 1 whole grain wrap, 1 cup mixed greens (spinach, kale, arugula), 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas, 1/4 avocado (sliced), 1/4 cup shredded carrots, 2 tbsp hummus
Lunch.instructions: Spread hummus on wrap, add greens, chickpeas, avocado, and carrots. Roll up and serve.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Trail Mix: 1/4 cup almonds, 1/4 cup dried cranberries, 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and enjoy.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts: 1 cup Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1/4 cup chopped almonds
Post-Workout Snack.instructions: Top Greek yogurt with berries and nuts.

Dinner.details: Hearty Salad Bowl: 1 cup mixed greens (spinach, kale, arugula), 1/2 cup cooked farro, 1/2 cup roasted chickpeas, 1/4 cup diced cucumbers, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes (halved), 2 tbsp sunflower seeds, 2 tbsp tahini dressing
Dinner.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with tahini dressing.

Evening Snack.details: Cottage Cheese with Nuts and Seeds: 1 cup cottage cheese, 1 tbsp flax seeds, 1 tbsp chia seeds, 1/4 cup mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts)
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with flax seeds, chia seeds, and nuts.
